::: {.minipage data-latex="{\textwidth}"}
## `IsUsingJavaScriptCookies`

Returns whether the web harvester parses JavaScript\index{web harvester!settings} for cookies needed by the website.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean IsUsingJavaScriptCookies()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`
:::
